data.name: Pressure Overdrive
data.detailed_description:
Step up a gear: Pressure returns with Overdrive! Start your steam buggy and join “La Resistance”...it’s still time to prevent Count Soap from powering his Uber-Spa with stolen water!

In Pressure Overdrive you revisit an action packed world, filled with crazy characters and funky humor. This enhanced version will challenge your skills, while you race, ram and blast your way through countless bullets and enemies. Customize your buggy for clever play styles and have a friend join the cause in local coop mode. “La Resistance” counts on you!



  • Enhanced version
  • Improved controls
  • New weapons
  • Single player and local coop
  • Campaign and freeplay mode
  • New endless mode
  • New bossfights
  • 3 worlds with 30+ Levels
  • Dozens of enemy types & 3 bossfights
  • Upgrade your buggy with 35+ items
  • Online highscores
  • 10 languages supported
  • Steamfunky soundtrack included!

data.short_description: Ready for Overdrive? Upgrade your steambuggy and pump up the Pressure, while you boost’n’blast your way through vibrant settings and countless enemies. Enhanced arcade action awaits in this new version!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese-Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 2,4 GHz Dual-Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible with 1024 MB or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2,4 GHz Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible with 2048 MB or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended
